sentences.english: Evaluation of air-to-air tactics(AAT) is a nuclear question of simulation experiment on air-to-air fight(AAF).
sentences.chinese: 空戰戰法的評估是空戰仿真實驗的核心理論問題。

sentences.english: Fire attack is a commonly used tactic in ancient Chinese wars.
sentences.chinese: 火攻戰法是中國古代戰爭中常用的戰術之一。

sentences.english: He is highly intelligent and expert in tactics and warfare.
sentences.chinese: 他是高度智能化和專家在戰術和戰法。

sentences.english: The tactics of long-range fire assaulting on aircraft carrier battle groups is the typical network-centric tactics.
sentences.chinese: 遠程火力突襲航母戰鬥羣戰法是典型的網絡中心戰法。

sentences.english: The tactics of long-range fire assaulting on aircraft carrier battle groups is the typical network-centric tactics.
sentences.chinese: 遠程火力突襲航母戰鬥羣戰法是典型的網絡中心戰法。
